Package pl.programmersrest.blog.model.service

Interface PostServiceManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PostService
    public interface PostServiceManager
extends PostService
    Provides basic operation on Posts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changePostStatus​(long id)
      Change post status from true to false and vice versa, when post status is false it's should not be listed for normal users.
      void createPost​(java.lang.String username, pl.programmersrest.blog.controllers.request.CreatePostRequest createPostRequest)
      Create a new post, note that title for posts need to be unique.
      void deletePost​(long id)
      Delete existing post. note that only user with ADMIN authority should be able to do this.
      void updateSpecificPost​(long id, pl.programmersrest.blog.controllers.request.UpdatePostRequest updatePostRequest)
      Update existing post. note that only user with ADMIN authority should be able to do this.

      • Methods inherited from interface pl.programmersrest.blog.model.service.PostService

    • Method Detail

      • updateSpecificPost

        void updateSpecificPost​(long id,
                        pl.programmersrest.blog.controllers.request.UpdatePostRequest updatePostRequest)
                 throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException,
                        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TitleTakenException
        Update existing post. note that only user with ADMIN authority should be able to do this.
        Parameters:
        id - Specified post which are we trying to update
        updatePostRequest - Specified new values for the post
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException - when post which this id is not present in database
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TitleTakenException - when post which the same title already exists in database

      • deletePost

        void deletePost​(long id)
         throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException
        Delete existing post. note that only user with ADMIN authority should be able to do this.
        Parameters:
        id - Specified post which are we trying to delete.
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException - when post is not present in database.

      • createPost

        void createPost​(java.lang.String username,
                pl.programmersrest.blog.controllers.request.CreatePostRequest createPostRequest)
         throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TitleTakenException
        Create a new post, note that title for posts need to be unique.
        Parameters:
        username - Specified user who create the post.
        createPostRequest - Specified details about post.
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.TitleTakenException - when post with the same title already exist in database.

      • changePostStatus

        void changePostStatus​(long id)
               throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException
        Change post status from true to false and vice versa, when post status is false it's should not be listed for normal users.
        Parameters:
        id - Specified which post should we change the status
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.PostNotFoundException - when post is not present in database
